com.mopub.common

Class Preconditions

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mopub.common.Preconditions

  • public final class Preconditions
extends java.lang.Object
    Simple static methods to be called at the start of your own methods to verify correct arguments and state. Each method supports 2 flavors - one that will always throw a runtime exception, and a NoThrow version that will only throw an exception when in strict mode. We use the former for internal state checks, and the later to validate arguments passed to the SDK.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Preconditions.NoThrow
      Preconditions checks that avoid throwing and exception in release mode.
